identity.name: Renault Trucks Ops - The Field Commander
identity.persona: A robust, industrial-grade tool designed for the grease and grit of the workshop. It prioritizes speed, legibility in harsh sunlight, and one-thumb operation. It is not delicate; it is tough.

usage_rules.primary: Use Yellow (#FACC15) for primary actions (FAB, Submit, Active States). It simulates the 'High-Vis' safety gear.
usage_rules.secondary: Use Renault Red (#71010D) ONLY for 'Damaged' tags, destructive actions, or critical alerts.
usage_rules.background: ALWAYS dark mode. Never use pure black (#000000); use Zinc-950 (#09090b) for depth.
usage_rules.text: Headings in White (#FAFAFA). Secondary text in Zinc-400 (#A1A1AA).

visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid #27272a (Zinc-800). No soft shadows, use hard edges or subtle 1px glows.
visual_enhancers.radius: Rounded-lg (0.5rem) for cards. Rounded-full for buttons/status pills.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only on the Bottom Navigation or Sticky Headers: bg-zinc-950/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-white/5.

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous touch targets. Min height 48px for all interactive elements.

buttons.default: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-yellow-500 font-bold uppercase tracking-wider rounded-md h-12 px-6 transition-transform active:scale-95

cards.style: bg-surface border border-border rounded-xl p-4 relative overflow-hidden

chat_bubbles.user: bg-primary text-black rounded-2xl rounded-tr-sm p-3 max-w-[85%] self-end shadow-sm
chat_bubbles.system: bg-zinc-800 text-zinc-100 rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm p-3 max-w-[85%] self-start border border-zinc-700
chat_bubbles.media: p-1 bg-zinc-800 border border-zinc-700 rounded-xl overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-zinc-900 border-zinc-700 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary text-white h-12 rounded-md

motion.micro_interactions: Active scale down (95%) on buttons. Slide-in from bottom for Modals.

assets.logo_placeholder: Use text 'RT OPS' in Barlow Condensed Bold if logo missing.

universal_guidelines: Dark Mode Default: The app is used in garages and trucks. Bright white screens are forbidden.
Touch Targets: Field techs have gloves or dirty hands. Buttons must be full-width on mobile.
Contrast: Text must be legible in direct sunlight. Use High Contrast colors.
No Gradients: Flat, matte surfaces. No gloss.
Offline Indicator: ALways show a 'Syncing...' or 'Offline' pill in the header if disconnected.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup Tailwind for Dark Mode force (class strategy, default 'dark').
3. Build the 'Chat Interface' as the core interaction model for adding photos/notes.
4. Admin Panel should be dense (Data Grid), Mobile App should be spacious (Cards).
